# Dyn-O-Tool

Tools for easier living with AWS DynamoDB


Features
--------

* Get a quick informational summary of any table
* Quickly grab 10 records from any table
* Export all or a subset of any DynamoDB table to CSV

Install
-------

    pip install dyn-o-tool
    
Usage
-----
